name: See my work on Git Hub!
paragraph: Please check out my github page! View some of my favorite starred projects, as well as projects I am working on now!

name: Connect With Me Via E-mail!
paragraph: We are all busy and sometimes the best way to reach someone is with a real quick e-mail. Feel free to reach out to me and request my phone number and we can even chat over the phone if you would like!

name: Connect on LinkedIn!
paragraph: Here is a link to take you to my linkedin profile! You can get to know a little bit more about me and my job history and the people I know. I would love to connect with you!

name: Resume!
paragraph: Take a look at my resume. My job history, how long I have been in my current and previous jobs, and what I accomplished while I was there.
